戦死者: (せんししゃ) - person killed in action; the war dead
戦歿: (せんぼつ) - death in battle; killed in action
戦没: (せんぼつ) - death in battle; killed in action
戦没者: (せんぼつしゃ) - persons who have fallen in battle
戦没者慰霊碑: (せんぼつしゃいれいひ) - war memorial
戦没者追悼: (せんぼつしゃついとう) - war memorial; memorial (monument) to war dead
戦没者追悼式: (せんぼつしゃついとうしき) - memorial service for the war dead
戦没者追悼記念日: (せんぼつしゃついとうきねんび) - Memorial Day (US)
戦況: (せんきょう) - war situation; progress of a battle
戦渦: (せんか) - chaos of war; war turmoil
戦火: (せんか) - wartime fire; war/wartime destruction/horrors of war
戦略兵器: (せんりゃくへいき) - strategic arms
戦略兵器削減条約: (せんりゃくへいきさくげんじょうやく) - Strategic Arms Reduction Treaty; START
戦略情報システム: (せんりゃくじょうほうシステム) - strategic information system; SIS
戦略核兵器: (せんりゃくかくへいき) - strategic nuclear weapon
戦略爆撃: (せんりゃくばくげき) - strategic bombing
戦略物資: (せんりゃくぶっし) - strategic resources; strategic materials
戦略物質: (せんりゃくぶっしつ) - strategic materials
戦略的パートナーシップ: (せんりゃくてきパートナーシップ) - strategic partnership
戦略的投票: (せんりゃくてきとうひょう) - strategic voting
戦略的提携: (せんりゃくてきていけい) - strategic partnership
戦略的撤退: (せんりゃくてきてったい) - strategic withdrawal; strategic retreat
戦略空軍: (せんりゃくくうぐん) - strategic air force
戦病死: (せんびょうし) - death from disease contracted at the front
戦禍: (せんか) - war damages; ravages of war
戦端を開く: (せんたんをひらく) - to open hostilities; to take up arms (against)
戦績: (せんせき) - war or military record; score; military achievements; results
戦術核兵器: (せんじゅつかくへいき) - tactical nuclear weapon
戦術航空統制本部: (せんじゅつこうくうとうせいほんぶ) - tactical air control center (centre)
戦術航空統制班: (せんじゅつこうくうとうせいはん) - tactical air control party
戦術計画: (せんじゅつけいかく) - tactical plan
戦車揚陸艦: (せんしゃようりくかん) - landing ship (tank); LST
戦闘ロボ: (せんとうロボ) - battle robot; war robot
戦闘前哨: (せんとうぜんしょう) - combat outpost
戦闘帽: (せんとうぼう) - field cap (used by Japanese troops in WW II)
戦闘序列: (せんとうじょれつ) - order of battle
戦闘支援計画: (せんとうしえんけいかく) - combat support plan
戦闘正面幅: (せんとうしょうめんはば) - frontage
戦闘爆撃機: (せんとうばくげきき) - fighter bomber
戦闘艦: (せんとうかん) - combat ship; combat vessel
戦闘配置: (せんとうはいち) - battle station; action stations
戦闘陣地の前縁: (せんとうじんちのぜんえん) - forward edge of the battle area
戦闘電子戦情報: (せんとうでんしせんじょうほう) - combat electronic warfare intelligence
戦陣: (せんじん) - battle array or formation; battlefield
戦雲: (せんうん) - war clouds; threat of war
截ち切る: (たちきる) - to cut apart (cloth, paper, etc.); (断ち切る, 断切る only) to sever (ties)/to break off (a relationship); (断ち切る, 断切る only) to cut off (an enemy's retreat)/to block (a road, etc.)/to disconnect
截ち割る: (たちわる) - to cut open; to cut apart; to divide; to split
截つ: (たつ) - to sever; to cut off; to suppress; to abstain (from)
截り口: (きりくち) - cut end/section/opening/slit; point of view/(different) perspective/new approach
截り金: (きりかね) - metallic foil cut into strips or other shapes to form decorative motifs; cutting a thin sheet of metal into shapes and affixing it with lacquer forming natural features (e.g. clouds)
截拳道: (ジークンドー) - Jeet Kune Do; Way of the Intercepting Fist (martial art founded by Bruce Lee)
截断: (さいだん) - cutting; severance; section; amputation; disconnection
截断機: (せつだんき) - cutter; cutting machine; guillotine
截然: (さいぜん) - clear; sharp; distinct; distinctive
截金: (きりかね) - metallic foil cut into strips or other shapes to form decorative motifs; cutting a thin sheet of metal into shapes and affixing it with lacquer forming natural features (e.g. clouds)
戮力協心: (りくりょくきょうしん) - (yoji) combined (concerted) efforts; solidarity; joining forces (with)
戯える: (そばえる) - to play pranks; to be spoiled; to be spoilt
戯かす: (じゃらかす) - to call for jokes
戯ける: (たわける) - to jest; to joke; to play the fool; to act indecently; to be silly over; to talk foolishly
戯け者: (たわけもの) - idiot; dummy; joker; fool; trickster
戯す: (じゃらす) - to play with; to toy with; to tease
